5 This information supports the information needs of financial market participants subject to Regulation (EU) 2019/2088 because
it is derived from an additional indicator related to principal adverse impacts set out in in indicator #16 of Table III of
Annex I of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/1288 with regard to disclosures rules on sustainable investments (“Cases
of insufficient action taken to address breaches of standards of anti-corruption and anti-bribery”).
